item.description:
Have you ever wondered if you've lived before?

Have you ever met someone and felt an instant affinity?

Do you possess a particular skill or interest in something

that seems to "just come naturally"?

Using self-hypnosis, explore experiences and relationships from

other lives while learning about strengths and weaknesses that

you have brought forward with you. Accessing these deeply held

memories leads to an adventure of endless exploration into

your innermost self.

FREE hypnosis CD included.

Bring a pillow, blanket and mat, if desired.

Preregistration required. Call Franklin Yoga & Wellness Center.


http://franklinyoga.com/

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: HYPNOSIS SEMINAR : Past Life Regression
